name: TheFightingEntrepreneur
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This podcast is for the fighters. It is for the people that are not afraid to fail, and will always get back up. In this podcast you will learn all about the challenges that you will face as an entrepreneur.

The host, Anik Singal, is a leader in the digital marketing, having made over $200,000,000 online. In this podcast, you will hear about his struggles, hardships, and some of the victories that he has achieved throughout his life, and how he dealt with it all. 

This podcast is to help entrepreneurs succeed, but also to prepare them for the challenges that they may face.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
